text: Ryan Peters is a Canadian singer-songwriter who lived in Rutland, British Columbia in his youth and graduated without honors. He now bases his career from Vancouver. Ryan Peters is the drummer in LadyhawkSasano, Mari (June 17, 2005). "Classic rawk flies with Ladyhawk", Edmonton Journal, p. H3. and also contributes to the vocals and lyrics. Peters was one of the original members of the Vancouver incarnation of Jon-Rae and the River, and also was part of the band Alpha BMX.Omori, Quinn (October 28, 2008). "The Origins Of Ladyhawk", Chartattack.com. Retrieved January 19, 2011. He partnered up with bandmate Darcy Hancock in a side-project called Sports. title: Ryan Peters (musician)
